app.title: Decision Analysis Sandbox
app.description: Explore decision scenarios with interactive templates and analysis

results.selecttemplate: Select a template to see key drivers

catalogue.connectionLost: Connection lost. We're attempting to reconnect automatically.
catalogue.networkError: Network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
catalogue.timeoutError: Request timed out. The service may be experiencing high demand.
catalogue.authRequired: Authentication required. Please sign in to continue.
catalogue.permissionDenied: Access denied. You don't have permission for this action.
catalogue.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please refresh and try again.
catalogue.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait a moment before trying again.
catalogue.capacityExceeded: Service is at capacity. We're working to resolve this shortly.
catalogue.quotaExceeded: Usage limit reached. Please upgrade your plan or try again later.
catalogue.invalidData: Invalid data received. Please check your input and try again.
catalogue.processingError: Processing error occurred. Our team has been notified.
catalogue.dataUnavailable: Data temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few moments.
catalogue.analysisFailed: Analysis could not be completed. Please try with a different template.
catalogue.modelUnavailable: Analysis model temporarily unavailable. Please try again shortly.
catalogue.seedError: Invalid seed value. Please select a different template.

success.exportReady: Export prepared and ready for download.

loading.analysing: Analysing your scenario. This may take a few moments.
